hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar reported the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) as saying:if one of you invites his brother, he should accept(the invitation), whether it is a wedding feast or something of that nature

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِجَابَةِ الدَّعْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been reported about accepting invitations
